name: Syria Refugee Slider
author: Trenza Softwares

sections.description: A simple plugin that integrates FlexSlider (http://flex.madebymufffin.com/) with WordPress using custom post types!. It’s for a charity cause to raise awareness about how many refugees still need our help. Use this shortcode [srs_slider];

short_description: A simple plugin that integrates FlexSlider (http://flex.madebymufffin.com/) with WordPress using custom post types!. It's for a charity cause to raise awareness about how many refugees still need our help. Use this shortcode [srs_slider];
